# sonatyperepo_capability_outreach_management (Resource)

Manage Capability: Outreach Management
		
**NOTE:** Requires Sonatype Nexus Repostiory 3.84.0 or later.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonatyperepo_capability_outreach_management" "outreach_capability" {
  enabled = true
  notes   = "Outreach management configuration"
  properties = {
    always_remote = false
    override_url  = "https://outreach.example.com"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Capability is enabled.
- `properties` (Attributes) Properties specific to this Capability type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--properties))

### Optional

- `notes` (String) Optional notes about configured capability.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The internal ID of the Capability.
- `last_updated` (String) String representation of the date/time the resource was last changed

<a id="nestedatt--properties"></a>
### Nested Schema for `properties`

Optional:

- `always_remote` (Boolean) Always check the remote server for updates.
- `override_url` (String) Override external URL for downloading new Outreach content.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import an existing Outreach Management Capability into Terraform State.
#
# NOTE: The CAPABILITY_ID can be obtained from the datasource.

# Example
terraform import sonatyperepo_capability_outreach_management.cap CAPABILITY_ID
```
